Screen - Class in screens
The Screen class represents the different screens from the program Each different screen extends from this class

Constructs a Screen by setting the width and height of the screen on the DrawingSurface

Shoes - Class in mannequin.clothes
The Shoes class represents an Shoe to be added to the screen using the Processing library.

Constructs a shoe with specified image
ShoesList - Class in mannequin.clothes
The ShoesList class represents a collection of all the Shoes to be added to the screen using the Processing library.
ShoesList() - Constructor for class mannequin.clothes.ShoesList
Constructs an AccessoryList containing an ArrayList of all the accessories and an ArrayList that is sorted based on the user settings
sortArray() - Method in class mannequin.clothes.AccessoryList
Sorts the ArrayList with all the accessories into the sorted ArrayList
sortArray() - Method in class mannequin.clothes.BottomsList

Sorts the ArrayList with all the shoes into the sorted ArrayList
sortArray() - Method in class mannequin.clothes.TopsList
Sorts the ArrayList with all the tops into the sorted ArrayList based on the user preferences
switchScreen(int) - Method in interface screens.ScreenSwitcher
This method takes in the index of the screen you want to switch to and switches to that screen
